summary: AN ORDINANCE relating to the Engineering Department; authorizing negotiation for and acquisition of the right to construct cut and fill slopes on private property abutting on 25th Avenue South from South Holgate Street to South Plum Street and from South Hill Street to Rainier Avenue South, required for the construction of sidewalks under the Neighborhood Improvement Program, as coordinated with the 25th Avenue South - Contract 6B Sewer Separation Project, and making an appropriation from the neighborhood Improvement Fund therefor.
